segments.text: I notice the woman is completely unaware of the growing puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how absorbed she is, polishing that plate with such dedication.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then my heart races as I look at the boy on the stool; he must realize how risky this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the tension building, a slight tremor in the air as he reaches further into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, standing so close, her eyes wide with anticipation, adds to this dangerous mix.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Thereâ€™s a kind of innocence to their mischief, but it feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, I can picture the chaos that would unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
